de.cau.cs.kieler.klighd.debug.transformations
Class ReinitializingTransformationProxy.ViewSynthesisScope

java.lang.Object
  de.cau.cs.kieler.klighd.debug.transformations.ReinitializingTransformationProxy.ViewSynthesisScope
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.inject.Scope
Enclosing class:
ReinitializingTransformationProxy
public class ReinitializingTransformationProxy.ViewSynthesisScope
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.inject.Scope

This Scope realizes the requirement of injecting the same instances of of helper classes into further helper classes.

Example: DataDependencyVisualisation --requires--> KNodeExtensions,
DataDependencyVisualisation --requires--> ExpressionVisuHelper --requires--> KNodeExtensions,

while the instances of KNodeExtensions should be the same.
In addition, the DataDependencyVisualisation may re-use the StateMachineVisualisation with

DataDependencyVisualisation --requires--> KNodeExtensions,

both sub types of AbstractTransformation. The helper instance(s) of that class however shall be disjoint from the ones of DataDependencyVisualisation's instance(s).
This requirement is realized by this Scope by maintaining a Set of instances that have already been created. If, however, an instance of AbstractTransformation or a subclass is requested, those instances will be forgotten - the set is cleared. Thus, new ones are requested from the upstream Provider.

Attention: Classes whose instantiation shall be controlled by this Scope must by annotated with the ViewSynthesisShared annotation.

Author:
chsch

Method Detail

scope

public <U> com.google.inject.Provider<U> scope(com.google.inject.Key<U> key,
                                               com.google.inject.Provider<U> unscoped)


This method is called once for each class ('key') to be injected. Hence (potentially) multiple Providers accessing the instances set exist. The returned provider is called each time an instance of 'key' is required.

Specified by:
scope in interface com.google.inject.Scope
Returns:
a Provider dedicated to the class denoted by 'key'
